categories.title: Market Analysis
categories.prompt: Analyze the market opportunity and competitive landscape described in the documents.

categories.title: Business Model
categories.prompt: Describe the business model and revenue streams outlined in the documents..

categories.title: Team Assessment
categories.prompt: Evaluate the founding team and key personnel mentioned in the documents.

categories.title: Financial Projections
categories.prompt: Summarize the financial projections and funding requirements mentioned in the documents.

categories.title: Risk Assessment
categories.prompt: Identify the key risks and challenges mentioned in the documents.

categories.title: Technology & IP
categories.prompt: Analyze the technology stack, intellectual property, and technical differentiators described in the documents.
